dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kanye West just announced in his live stream that he's not actually running for president—he said, and I quote, "I'm sitting to lose."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kanye West just announced in his live stream that he's not actually running for president-he said, and I quote, I'm sitting to lose.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about that directly, West said that rather than running for president, he was walking, quickly adding that he was walking . . . to win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so he's admitting he's just a spoiler? But then he also claimed he's running to support Donald Trump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so he's admitting he's just a spoiler? But then he also claimed he's running to support Donald Trump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the billionaire rap superstar indicated, in an interview by text today, that he was in fact running to siphon votes from the presumptive Democratic nominee, Joe Biden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but when pressed about who's behind his ballot access efforts, especially with those Democratic operatives reportedly helping him get on in Wisconsin, he just deflected.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but when pressed about who's behind his ballot access efforts, especially with those Democratic operatives reportedly helping him get on in Wisconsin, he just deflected.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kanye West Amid various reports that Republican and Trump-affiliated political operatives are trying to get Kanye West onto various state ballots for Novembers presidential election, the billionaire rap superstar indicated, in an interview by text today, that he was in fact running to siphon votes from the presumptive Democratic nominee, Joe Biden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and then he hit back with "Satan is King"—like, what does that even mean in this context?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and then he hit back with Satan is King-like, what does that even mean in this context?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When it was pointed out that he actually cant win in 2020that he wont be on enough ballots to yield 270 electoral votes, and that a write-in campaign isnt feasibleand thus was serving as a spoiler, West replied: Im not going to argue with you. Jesus is King.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And President Biden didn't hold back either—yesterday he straight up said, "I dislike Kanye very much," and implied he's working to get him off the ballot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And President Biden didn't hold back either-yesterday he straight up said, I dislike Kanye very much, and implied he's working to get him off the ballot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I like Kanye very much, President Trump told reporters at the White House yesterday. No, I have nothing to do with him getting on the ballot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then Kanye's also talking about designing a video game and meeting with Hillary Clinton about post-Covid education? It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then Kanye's also talking about designing a video game and meeting with Hillary Clinton about post-Covid education? It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West says that hes designing a school within the next month and that Im meeting with Betsy DeVos about the post-Covid curriculum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And don't forget, he's been texting "Trump 2020" with a raised fist emoji all summer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And don't forget, he's been texting Trump twenty twenty with a raised fist emoji all summer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Texts from West to me earlier this summer repeatedly ended with the sign-off Trump 2020, and a fist raised high.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So he's still a Trump supporter, but he's also… denying he's being used as a spoiler? Even though it looks exactly like a coordinated effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he's still a Trump supporter, but he's also... denying he's being used as a spoiler? Even though it looks exactly like a coordinated effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West did not respond when asked whether he feels hes being used.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the whole thing about his mental health—Taylor Swift and others have expressed concern publicly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the whole thing about his mental health-Taylor Swift and others have expressed concern publicly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests recent actions have also drawn public focus, given his bipolar disorderand many, including his wife, Kim Kardashian-West, have expressed concern about his mental health.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and when asked if he feels used, he called it a "Devil production." Not exactly clarifying things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and when asked if he feels used, he called it a Devil production. Not exactly clarifying things.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And his platform? He's got this "Birthday Party" with pro-choice stuff and anti-vaccine theories? It's a wild mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And his platform? He's got this Birthday Party with pro-choice stuff and anti-vaccine theories? It's a wild mix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank that alleged that Planned Parenthood was placed in cities by white supremacists, a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then he praises Trump for… letting God in the conversation? And says Trump hiding in the bunker was a success?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then he praises Trump for... letting God in the conversation? And says Trump hiding in the bunker was a success?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I dont like that I caught wind that he hid in the bunker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, it feels like he's trolling everyone—media, politicians, the whole system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, it feels like he's trolling everyone-media, politicians, the whole system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with ballot deadlines looming, this is gonna get messier before it gets clearer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with ballot deadlines looming, this is gonna get messier before it gets clearer.

artist_script:
Tuesday afternoon, a live video stream from Kanye West’s studio.
HostA: Kanye West just announced in his live stream that he’s not actually running for president—he said, and I quote, "I’m sitting to lose."
HostB: Wait, so he’s admitting he’s just a spoiler? But then he also claimed he’s running to support Donald Trump.
HostA: Yeah, but when pressed about who’s behind his ballot access efforts, especially with those Democratic operatives reportedly helping him get on in Wisconsin, he just deflected.
HostB: Right, and then he hit back with "Satan is King"—like, what does that even mean in this context?
HostA: And President Biden didn’t hold back either—yesterday he straight up said, "I dislike Kanye very much," and implied he’s working to get him off the ballot.
HostB: But then Kanye’s also talking about designing a video game and meeting with Hillary Clinton about post-Covid education? It’s all over the place.
HostA: Totally. And don’t forget, he’s been texting "Trump 2020" with a raised fist emoji all summer.
HostB: So he’s still a Trump supporter, but he’s also… denying he’s being used as a spoiler? Even though it looks exactly like a coordinated effort.
HostA: And then there’s the whole thing about his mental health—Taylor Swift and others have expressed concern publicly.
HostB: Yeah, and when asked if he feels used, he called it a "Devil production." Not exactly clarifying things.
HostA: And his platform? He’s got this "Birthday Party" with pro-choice stuff and anti-vaccine theories? It’s a wild mix.
HostB: But then he praises Trump for… letting God in the conversation? And says Trump hiding in the bunker was a success?
HostA: Honestly, it feels like he’s trolling everyone—media, politicians, the whole system.
HostB: For sure. And with ballot deadlines looming, this is gonna get messier before it gets clearer.
